title: QBase Worksheet Manifest
description: Manifest for a single worksheet used by frontend/worksheet.html. Loaded from ./data/worksheets/{wID}.json.

title.description: Display title for the worksheet. Falls back to 'Worksheet' when omitted.

pages.description: Ordered list of page image URLs for the worksheet. Use image formats renderable by (e.g., PNG/JPG). Relative URLs resolve against '/qbase/'.

answers.description: Optional ordered list of answer key image URLs. If provided, the 'Answer Key' section is shown with mask/reveal tools.
